Name: Legend Of Mercy 神医魔导
About the game: The World Legend of Mercy is set in a fantasy world of sword and magic where a terrible and deadly plague is sweeping the land. However, this plague only effects the males of the races, while leaving the females unharmed. This has left only one male for every ten thousand females. Besides this, the four races of the continent: humans, high elves, Moyzu, and dark elves have split into two opposing alliances and have begun a war for the ages. With a population crisis and the ever-growing plague, the war has pushed the continent to the very edge of ruin. As a doctor with incredible skill, you are called to this world by the goddess at this time of crisis. Accompanied by girls from both alliances, you are tasked to find a way to save the world together. A large story of epic proportion A huge world, compelling story, high-quality images, and over thirteen chapters telling a very long story. Even without the images, sound, and gameplay, this could still be considered an amazing fantasy time-travel novel. Rich gameplay The game world can be explored freely, including 15 locations and hundreds of scenes. Exploring, treasure hunting, and discovering extra hidden elements are also part of the fun of the game. Whether you are saving a patient or fighting an enemy in the war, the innovative gameplay approach brings with it a unique experience with 21 main story levels and even more free-challenge levels. Play your way through mini-games such as pub games, alchemy and medicine creation, and puzzle solving. Win the girl’s heart An extensive relationship development system complete with a store, gift giving, and a letter sending system. You can have up to fourteen girls and almost each one has their own story line and ending. Having a closer relationship with the girls allows you to unlock further ‘accommodations’ with them, bringing you two closer together. Because of the few males in the world, playing well can lead you to having your own harem! Sound design Fully voice acted (in Chinese), with touching original voiced music and theme songs. Dedication After four years of production, a story of fantasy and adventure is waiting for you to join!
